website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ZenFone Zoom is a camera-centric unlocked phone with a 3x optical zoom, but it's held back by average sensor quality, a slow camera app, and no 4K video recording.
cons: Dated UI with heavy skin and lots of bloatware

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging is less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: This phone has very decent specs & despite the less than stellar battery life, I thought it performed well for the price. The only problem is that it no longer charges & I only had it for a few weeks. Do yourself a favor & get something else, I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Price

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for low budget phone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome flagship phone from Asus for such a low price. Cons: charge is getting reduced fast Overall worth for money
customer_reviews.author: Bharathiraja

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very fast smart phone and excellent camera. Fully unlocked and the price fair. The camera is a show. Compare with the camera of Samsung j7 and Motorola Moto G5 plus and can not compare. Much better! But it is comparable to the Zenfone 3 camera that also has a very good camera! Excellent purchase. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received Defective Phone 👎, bad experience!!
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective piece (mobile receiver/transmitter isn't working from day one), complained Amazon who redirected to vendor who was least interested to resolve the issue. Took their sweet time to just send me the shipping label for return (not in favor of my interest but giving me only option). Firstly defective phone disappointed me and then with fate it so happened my wife dropped the phone leaving few cracks on the case and now the vendor had taken advantage not to fix nor send me a new one. I wish good luck who wish to purchase this phone thru this vendor & Amazon combination!!👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Govardhan Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cell phone. I bought it for my uncle and he is really happy with it. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Nara

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to handle.
customer_reviews.text: Ran super hot. Almost too hot to touch. If you like the feeling of a hot coffee with no protective sleeve sitting in your pocket all day, this is the phone for you.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur durkin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disappointed! GPS does not work!!!! The battery doesn't hold!!! Thank screen is blinking all the time!!!! Don't buy this phone, you will lost you money
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya

customer_reviews.title: This phone is better than anything on the market
customer_reviews.text: This phone is better than anything on the market. I lost my asus zenfone 2 in a pool accident. I would definitely buy this again. Asus phones rule!
customer_reviews.author: u458625

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The equipment is extreme, it never stops. Is a monstrously powerful terminal.
customer_reviews.author: julioc

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying Greatly
customer_reviews.text: I have had a recent run of bad luck with phones of late. That was killed by this phone. Not only is there plenty of RAM, but the 64 GB ROM really makes it a plus. Also, the camera is a terrific one. I love the features for the camera app. Can't say enough good stuff about it. The one drawback, however, I've found is that battery life isn't so great. But all things considered, my satisfaction level is way up there.
customer_reviews.author: TUCHEH P STONE

customer_reviews.title: I was searching for 2 sims, this phone came ...
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for 2 sims, this phone came up.... I'd trusted the search and didn't read the specific.... Very disappoined to to find out it's only 1 sim...
customer_reviews.author: Ana Fox

customer_reviews.title: Won't let you down and wont kill your pocket book.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone except for the way they designed the back. The camera circle makes it impossible to use Niteize Steelie magnet mount. Everything else is great. Battery holds up well (depending on what you have running). Zero issues with performance. This is both my personal and company phone so it gets plenty of use. Office 365, two driver management apps, pandora and GPS 140+ miles a day.
customer_reviews.author: William H

customer_reviews.title: Phone worked great for about 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Phone worked great for about 2 months. Now its slow as a nokia brick. Sending a text msg via the normal android app constantly crashes, won't send or simply deletes the message after hitting send. Came from the Zen phone max, this is suppose to be faster with less battery but better camera. The less battery part is 100% true. This phone barely makes it to lunch time from 100% after only 6 months of use. I would not recommend this phone to anyone who will use it more than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: christian Gauspohl

customer_reviews.title: Cel phone is really nice anyway!
customer_reviews.text: I read internactional but did not though that adaptator was for UK. Anyway the sent me and adaptator for US. Anyway I could use the USB with another adaptator for the country I live. Cel phone is really nice anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Mihelj

customer_reviews.title: Fastest phone and largest storage in this price range!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Fast and plenty of storage! Battery life could be better. I get about 16 hours with minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: m. delehanty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good phone and better price for this phone, excellent camera and processor for very good internet speed
customer_reviews.author: hecima43

customer_reviews.text: Amaizing phone.. however i was so upset cuse it took so long for me to get it.. but amazon help me out, great phone resolution and for the price
customer_reviews.author: Willian Manuel Camargo torres

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Great beautiful looking phone a lot specs,but battery is awful.The camera, horrible pics. But lots of apps to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: raul isla

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a diehard Samsung Galaxy fangirl... until I tried this phone. Instant convert. It's fast, cool looking, amazing screen, incredible camera... everything has been amazing. I got this phone over 2 years ago and it's still in perfect condition. Just as fast as the day I got it. The battery life is very long, and have I mentioned that the camera is incredible? Seriously. It is. I would recommend this phone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Safford

customer_reviews.text: i think the international version is the same as the unlocked us version check the bands available and check with the international carrier of your choice

product_meta.title: Asus ZenFone Zoom (ZX551ML) 64GB Black, 5.5-inch, 4GB RAM, 13 MP, GSM Unlocked International Version, No Warranty
feature_bullets: 5.5-inch WQHD with 1080 x 1920 pixels Resolution Display, Intel Atom Moorefield Z3580, Quad-core 2.3 GHz CPU, 64GB ROM, 4GB RAM; Supports Micro-SD up to 128GB, Main Camera: 13 MP, 4128 x 3096 pixels, laser autofocus, 3x optical zoom, optical image stabilization, dual-LED (dual tone) flash; Front Camera: 5MP .
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.

Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all areas: 2G GSM : 850MHz/900MHz/1800MHz/1900MHz, 3G WCDMA : 850MHz(5)/900MHz(8)/1900MHz(2) /2100MHz(1), 4G : FDD-LTE: 2100MHz(1)/1900MHz(2)/1800MHz(3)/1700MHz,AWS(4)/850MHz(5)/2600MHz(7)/900MHz(8)/800MHz(20).
This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
Box contains: Phone, USB cable, Charger (may be foreign) If so, a FREE US adapter will be included, User Guide.
